text: 1.10: Stt 19.4-5; 1 T 6.3; 2 T 4.3; Ta 1.9Nta vhɨra harigi gumgi gu mbigi ruarir wari ndi, nta ne nzuav mbe nzuai. Nta vhɨra gumgi Sodoman kav muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi, mba khesharigi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi gu mbigi, nta mbe nzuav nzuai. Nta vhɨra gumgi harigi gumgi kɨɨv, mbe ndi mbaim, mbe fura harigi gumgir ŋaar gumgi ki gumgi ga nzuav nzuai. Nta vhɨra bigi guiguigav, fhura kha vun ki guma zɨ ziti gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuav, vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme suaŋgi tɨvi panan nta kegi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi gu mbigi nta vhɨra mbe nzuav nzuai.
